targets.expr: sum by (status_code,route) (rate(tempo_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~".*$component", route=~"$route",status_code=~"2.*|success"}[$__rate_interval])) >0 or on() vector(0)
sum by (status_code,route) (rate(tempo_request_duration_seconds_count{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~".*$component", route=~"$route",status_code=~"4.*|error|5.*"}[$__rate_interval])) >0 or on() vector(0)
